casebody.data:
Edward Jurczenia et al. v. Planning and Zoning Commission of the Town of Greenwich et al. (11844)

Heiman, Freedman and Cretella, Js.

Argued November 2 decision released November 23, 1993 Charles W. Pieterse, with whom was L. Page Heslin, for the appellant (named plaintiff). Jane D. Hogeman, for the appellee (defendant Vincent Giagni). John K. Wetmore, assistant town attorney, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
